title: Sevilla 'join Manchester United in the race to sign Mario Mandzukic from Juventus in January'
text:
Julen Lopetegui is thought to have lined up the Croatian star for a January move

Sevilla are reportedly challenging Manchester United in the race to sign Juventus striker Mario Mandzukic.

Julen Lopetegui is looking to bolster his attacking options as the Sevilla boss looks to alter a misfiring forward line which has struggled to deal with the summer departure of Wissam Ben Yedder.

Manchester United's attacking problems meanwhile are well documented as Ole Gunnar Solskjaer looks to buy in January to ease the burden on youngsters Marcus Rashford and Daniel James, who played as split forwards in the Red Devils' recent draw with Liverpool.

Sevilla have identified Mario Mandzukic as a transfer target for January to rival Man United

Marca reports Mandzukic, 33, is looking for a move away from Turin as he seeks more first-team football - the Croatian is yet to play a minute for Maurizio Sarri's side this season.

'We're talking to Mario to find the best possible solution,' Juventus chief Fabio Paratici said recently.

'We're open to any option. Whether he stays or goes, we want a solution to be found.'

Mandzukic has found himself out of favour for Juventus this season under Maurizio Sarri

Earlier this week Mandzukic was thought to be edging closer to a Manchester United move as he reportedly halved his £300,000-a-week wage demands.

But now Sevilla have entered the race for the Croatian international, opening up the possibility of a transfer tuggle between the La Liga side and Manchester United.

United have looked desperately short of striking options so far this season having failed to replace Alexis Sanchez, who joined Inter Milan on loan, and Romelu Lukaku, who joined the Italian giants in a £74million deal on deadline day.

Having won the Champions League, Serie A four times, and the Bundesliga twice, plundering 188 club goals in the process, Mandzukic fits the profile and calibre of striker Manchester United are after.
description: Julen Lopetegui is 'looking to bolster his attacking options with Mario Mandzukic' as the Sevilla boss looks to alter a misfiring forward line in La Liga.
